h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Fiery Gourd Location
content: Along the path, you will find a chest which holds the Fiery Gourd. Continue along the path to also find the Skandha of Thought, one of the Key Items you need to find a secret boss in the game's sixth chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fiery_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Fiery Gourd', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Fiery Gourd Location'.
The content is as follows:
Along the path, you will find a chest which holds the Fiery Gourd. Continue along the path to also find the Skandha of Thought, one of the Key Items you need to find a secret boss in the game's sixth chapter.
